Utilities¶

Set of utility functions.

@author: Eraldo Pomponi

@copyright: The MIIC Development Team (eraldo.pomponi@uni-leipzig.de)

@license: GNU Lesser General Public License, Version 3 (http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/lesser.html)

General Use¶

dir_read Create a list of files in a dir tree which name match a def pattern.
archive_code Read parameters and archive code
create_path Create a given path with all preceeding parts.
mat_to_ndarray Load a Matlab file into a dictionary.
lat_lon_ele_load Load lat lon and ele from a tab delimited file.
convert_time Convert a list/array of timestaps in a array of datetime.datetime obj
convert_time_to_string Convert a list/array of datetime.datetime obj to an array of strings

BlockCanvas oriented¶

create_rnd_array Creates a random normal 2D ndarray.
create_range_array Creates a 1D ndarray using range.
dict_sel Dictionary element selection.
add_prefix Add a prefix to a read-only string.
merge_str Merge two strings.
ndarray_to_mat Save an ndarray to a Matlab file.
convert_to_matlab Save an ObsPy Stream to a series of Matlab files.
stack Stacks together arrays of compatible size.
clear_global_X Reset the global variable X to None
submat_x Extract a sub-matrix from a matrix X along the x-axis (columns)
submat_y Extract a sub-matrix from a matrix X along the y-axis (rows).
nd_mat_center_part Extract the “central” part of a matrix.
matrix_product Simple matrix product using np.dot
collapse_to_single_vect Collapse a matrix to a single normalized vector along a defined axis.
find_comb Find all possible combinations written in the filenames
from_str_to_datetime Convert a dash separated string date in a datetime object.
extract_time_vect Extract time vector from filenames.
norm1 Matrix normalization.
transpose Transpose the matrix X
reshape_mat_to_vect Reshape the matrix elements to obtain a 1D array.
nd_nan_to_num Replace NaNs with 0 and +-Inf with +-large number.
combinations Create the list of combinations.
comb_with_missed_stations Create the list of combinations.
nd_save Save an ndarray in the original NumPy format.
nd_load Load an ndarray from a file in NumPy format (.npy)
nd_toList Convert a numpz arraz to a list
load_matlab_file Load variables from MatLab file.
enum_list Enumerate a list
to_str Convert a variable to string
nd_size Return and print the shape of an ndarray
fold_acausal Fold the acausal part of an Auto/Cross corr.
demean Return x minus the mean(x)
stream_demean Removes the mean from all Traces in signals
detrend Return x minus best fit line; “linear” detrending
stream_detrend Removes the trend from all Traces in signals
trace_calc_az_baz_dist Return azimut, back azimut and distance between tr1 and tr2 This funtions calculates the azimut, back azimut and distance between tr1 and tr2 if both have geo information in their stats dictonary.
nextpow2 Return the smalest integer number larger than n that is a power of 2.
select_var_from_dict Select variable from dictionary.
add_var_to_dict Add a variable to a dictionary.
print_keys_from_dict Print the keys present in a dictionary.
save_dict_to_matlab_file Save a dictionary to a matlab file.
flatten Return the flattened version of the input array x
flatten_recarray Flatten a recarray
save_dv Save dv dictionary
corr_check Correlation function dictionary check
corr_mat_check Correlation matrix dictionary check
dv_check Velocity change dictionary check
create_panel Create a Panel given a list of DataFrame and a list of names
dv_dataframe_weight Multiply column-by-column two DataFrame
trimmed_std Trimmed standard deviation.
ref_sine Reference sine waveform.
print_input Print its input.
print_tuples Print tuples.
print_tuple Print a tuple.
load_pickled_Series_DataFrame_Panel Load a pickled DataFrame (ref.
get_values_DataFrame Get the values out of DataFrame (ref.
from_comb_to_stations_list Extract the list of stations involved in a series of combinations
from_str_comb_to_list From a list of str combinations to a list of tuples
from_single_pattern_to_panel Create pandas.Panel object recombining all corr and dv curves.
create_date_obj Creates a datetime object
